short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly check if content from ChatGPT is plagiarized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you rely heavily on ChatGPT for your written content?
If so, it's essential that you ensure your work is 100% original and free of plagiarism.

The ChatGPT Plagiarism Checker, developed by PlagiaShield, is the perfect Chrome Extension for this purpose:

- Unlimited plagiarism checks right from the ChatGPT website.
- live massive check of the web
- $3 per month
- Also includes 100 plagiarism checks per month for documents

With this tool, you can easily check if any of your ChatGPT content contains text very similar what has already published another author.

With just one click, the extension will scan the content and let you know if any sentences or phrases are an exact or near match to other sources on the web, along with associated sources.

For a detailed step-by-step tutorial, use the 'Support URL' link in this Chrome store page.
